page.title: 08A Haslington Child's Day.
page.content: On Sunday I wake up at 6o'clock and wash and get dressed. I hate making the bed after I've got my brother Ashley out. Then I go downstairs and make four bowls of Cornflakes when the rest of the family come down. It gets very noisy and hectic. After we've had breakfast and put the dishes in the dish washer we go out to mow the lawns and trim the hedges. Last week I picked the blackcurrants and put them in a bowl. It took ages. In the afternoon, after lunch,we usaually play in the garden or sometimes we go out on a trip. Sunday is a relaxing day but there isn't much to do. In the evening we play out but if the weather is bad we watch television with our parents.
